statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); printf "$(whoami)@$(hostname -s):$(basename "$current_dir")"; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$current_dir" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf " (%s)" "$branch"; fi
